doctor.name: Dr. Muhammad Zainul Abedin Sohag
doctor.info: Dr. Muhammad Zainul Abedin Sohag is a Neurosurgeon in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurosurgery Department at Central Medical College & Hospital, Comilla. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Gomati Hospital, Comilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Muhammad Zainul Abedin Sohag at Gomati Hospital, Comilla is 9am to 12pm (Friday), 2pm to 6pm (Saturday & Sunday).

doctor.name: Dr. Jalal Ahmed Ripon
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Spine, Nerve, Stroke) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Comilla Trauma Center (Specialized Orthopedic & General Hospital)
doctor.info: Dr. Jalal Ahmed Ripon is a Neurosurgeon in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Neurosurgery) BSMMU. He is a Consultant (Neurosurgery) at Comilla Trauma Center (Specialized Orthopedic & General Hospital). He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Comilla Trauma Center. Practicing hour of Dr. Jalal Ahmed Ripon at Comilla Trauma Center is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 511, Nazrul Avenue, Ranir Bazar Road, Kandirpar, Cumilla

doctor.name: Dr. Saiful Hoque
doctor.specialty: Brain, Spine, Nerve, Stroke Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Saiful Hoque is a highly qualified brain, spine, nerve, and stroke specialist and surgeon in Cumilla. He holds an MBBS, BCS (Health), and MS in Neurosurgery, and has received advanced training through a fellowship in Endoscopic Spine and Minimally Invasive Spine Surgery from South Korea. He is also a proud member of both the American Association of Neurosurgeons (AANS) and the European Association of Neurosurgeons (EANS). Dr. Hoque currently serves as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Neurosurgery at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He provides specialized treatment at Moon Hospital, Cumilla, located on Shahid Khawaja Nizamuddin Road, Jhautola. His chamber is open from 4:00 PM to 9:00 PM, Sunday to Wednesday. For expert neurosurgical care in Cumilla, Dr. Saiful Hoque is a trusted name.

chamber.address: Shahid Khawaja Nizamuddin Road, Jhautola, Cumilla
